entries.journal_entry_description: Ravi has detailed how the smugglers have stolen much of the Selonian's supplies. There are certain supplies the Selonians must have for continued existence. The foremost is food, the next is basic materials so they can provide food for themselves, and the last is electronics to repair their environmental machines. She would also like you to destroy the smugglers weapons cache if you come across it.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: The first supplies Ravi needs is food. The smugglers keep the Selonians on a very restricted diet. The Selonians need food badly.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: The next supplies Ravi needs are basic construction materials to make camps for their expeditions to harvest food. The smugglers took all of their basic supplies to prevent them from doing this.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: The next group of supplies Ravi needs are replacement electronic parts. The Selonians are a technologically advanced race despite their preference for living in caves. Much of their machinery and equipment is beginning to fail. The Selonians need the parts to make repairs on their evironmental control machines.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: You have collected all the supplies Ravi has asked for. The final task she asked of you is to destroy the smugglers weapons cache. While the Selonians could use the weapons, Ravi feels they could take the smugglers on if both groups were unarmed.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: You have collected enough supplies and destroyed the weapons cache, it's time to return to Ravi with your report.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: Find the last electronics crate Ravi has asked for.
entries.task08_journal_entry_description: Find the first electronics crate Ravi has asked for.
entries.task09_journal_entry_description: Find the last hide crate Ravi has asked for.

entries.task15_journal_entry_description: Locate the first food crate Ravi has asked for.
